title.rendered: How do you reset your Canon printer? Here Is The Solution

content.rendered:
Canon printers come with inherent indicators that perceive the ink level in the Canon ink cartridges and restrict the printer from functioning when the ink level reaches a precarious level. In some conditions, your Canon printer might be unsuccessful to reset properly, when you change a cartridge. Most people ask questions about how to reset canon printer and sometimes they get the right answer and sometimes not. This issue generally happens when you replenish a printer cartridge, in place of substituting the empty cartridge with a new cartridge. If your Canon printer misses resetting when a cartridge is installed, you can reset it very easily.

You may face various issues related to your canon printer that might frustrate you. In that case, you can contact Canon support. Experts will get in touch with you and try to resolve your issue as soon as possible. For any assistance, you can call experts 24*7.

Table of Contents

  • Factory Resets
  • Ink Cartridge Resets
  • Operative steps to reset canon printer
    • 1. Practical ways to Reset your Canon Printer to Factory settings
      • To perform the factory reset option,
    • 2. Ways to reset Canon Printer Ink Cartridge
  • What can I do if I am still having a problem to reset my printer?
  • Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
    • 1. How Do I Reset My Canon Printer Back To Factory Settings?
    • 2. How Do I Reset My Canon Wireless Printer?
    • 3. How Do I Reset My Canon Maxify Printer?
    • 4. How Do I Reset My Printer?
    • 5. What Is A Hard Reset On A Printer?
    • 6. How Do You Trick A Canon Printer Cartridge?
    • 7. How Do I Clear The Memory On My Canon Printer?
    • 8. Why Is My Canon Printer Not Responding?
    • 9. How Do I Fix Printer Not Detected?

Factory Resets

The menu of a canon printer provides access to the factory reset option. Using this option you will return all the settings to factory stipulations and can require reconnecting to your own network and moving through the complete setup process again.

Ink Cartridge Resets

When you fit a new ink cartridge, the canon printer will guide you through the cartridge realignment procedure before permitting you to move forward with the new print jobs. Perform the menu prompts for realignment and print a sample sheet of paper. Refilled ink cartridges make a reset issue for Canon printers, and there are numerous ways to fix the printer problem. For printers of the version Pixma MP/MX/MG, ink cartridge resets ask you to reset the printer as per the BCH technology.

Operative steps to reset canon printer

1. Practical ways to Reset your Canon Printer to Factory settings

Resetting the Canon printer to its default factory setting will reinstate it back to its original time, clear all the settings and stipulations that you have made after getting it. This would also require reconnecting your printer to your own network and establishing the entire setup process again. Although, this is the coolest way to get rid of all the issues and error messages.

To perform the factory reset option,

  • Turn on your printer and go to the menu.
  • Access the directional arrows to perform in the setup menu.
  • Go to the Device settings and then press OK.
  • Choose the Reset settings option and then press OK to start the process.

2. Ways to reset Canon Printer Ink Cartridge

When you replenish or re-install the ink cartridge on the Canon printer, it sometimes encounters a reset issue. However, there are countless ways to resolve the problem, the most common way is to reset the printer according to BCH technology.  Perform these steps to reset in the correct way.

  • Turn off your printer.
  • Hit the Power button along with pressing the Stop button.
  • Release the Stop button for some time.
  • Again, keep holding the Power button and hit the Stop button two more times.
  • After around 30 seconds, the printer will show an “O” on the screen.
  • Hit the Stop button four more times before hitting the Power button twice.
  • Now, tap the Power button one more time to switch off your printer. This will conclude the reset process.
  • Reset the ink cartridges by releasing the printer’s power and USB cables.
  • Open the ink cartridge door while hitting the Power button and connect the power cables again along with the Power button is pressed.
  • Shut the cartridge door, and then leave the Power button.

What can I do if I am still having a problem to reset my printer?

By following the aforesaid steps you can easily reset your Canon Printer to factory settings as well as reset the Canon Printer ink cartridge. Now you get an answer the question of how to reset canon printer, Still, you are unable to do that So, feel free to call Canon support by dialing the canon customer support phone number to speak with our expert technicians. They will help you easily to reset your Canon printer with the help of Canon Printer Reset Software and aid you to make the most of technology.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

1. How Do I Reset My Canon Printer Back To Factory Settings?

Resetting to the factory setting will re-change all the changes you made in the setting of your canon printer. Hence, before you begin, you should think about whether you have to proceed further or not. If yes, then,

  1. Turn on your printer
  2. Open the main menu
  3. Navigate through the ‘Setup’ menu by using the directional arrows.
  4. Reach out to the ‘Device Settings’
  5. Press the ‘OK’ option.
  6. Now, a ‘Reset settings’ option appears, just select it.

After that, you need to press ‘OK’ to start the process of resetting your printer to factory settings.

2. How Do I Reset My Canon Wireless Printer?

  1. To do so, you need to tap on the ‘Wireless’ icon available on the canon printer
  2. Now, touch the ‘Network’ button and then ‘Wireless’.
  3. Next, you have to touch the ‘On’ option.
  4. In the Wireless Setup Wizard, you need to tap the ‘Continue’ option.
  5. Tap the ‘OK’ button
  6. Enter the password of your printer
  7. Tap ‘OK’ option to proceed with resetting.

Follow the on-screen instructions and you will be successfully reset your Canon wireless printer with ease.

3. How Do I Reset My Canon Maxify Printer?

If your Canon Maxify Printer is not working due to various small glitches and hitches, you should reset your canon printer. For that, you need to first turn off the printer and then unplug the connecting wires (USB, power capable etc). After a minute, you need to consider reconnecting the power capable and USB to connect the device and printer. Now, you should press and hold the power button for a few seconds and release it when the light blinks. Doing so will surely reset the Canon Maxify Printer and helps you to enhance your experience.

4. How Do I Reset My Printer?

  1. For that, you will have to turn the printer off.
  2. After that, you will have to disconnect the power cable.
  3. After a few seconds, you need to reconnect the cable.
  4. While holding down the resume button, you should turn on the printer.
  5. Once the light starts turning on, you have to release the resume button.

By implementing the above-mentioned steps, you will be able to reset the canon printer successfully. Besides, you can also get assistance if any kind of technicalities take place.

5. What Is A Hard Reset On A Printer?

For that, you need to follow the below-noted instructions carefully.

  1. You need to power-off your printer on your first step.
  2. Here, locate and press the ‘Stop’ button and simultaneously hold the ‘ON’ button.
  3. Moving to next, you need to release the ‘Stop’ button.
  4. Hereafter, press the ‘Stop’ button for the 5 times constantly.
  5. Once done, you need to release all the buttons.

Doing so will hard reset your printer and resolve a wide variety of hitches and glitches from the root

6. How Do You Trick A Canon Printer Cartridge?

Are you having a hard time with your Canon Printer ink cartridge? Are you often getting massage of ink cartridge replacement? However, if you don’t want to replace it, you should just try a trick. First, you should open the printer’s top and then remove the cartridge safely. Once you remove, you should vigorously shake the cartridge. After that, you should reinstall the cartridge and close the top of the printer properly. Now, for the testing purpose, you should have a try to print a page and check whether it is working.

7. How Do I Clear The Memory On My Canon Printer?

For that, you should carefully follow these steps:

  1. Go to the Control panel ad open the ‘Devices and Printers’ option.
  2. Right-click the printer you want to clear memory from
  3. Click on the ‘See What’s Printing’ option.
  4. In the printer menu, click on the ‘Cancel All Documents’ option.
  5. Choose ‘Yes’ the list should clear’ option.

Once you complete the above-mentioned steps, you should quickly reboot your computer system. Doing so will clear out all the memory that is full of printing jobs.

8. Why Is My Canon Printer Not Responding?

Canon printer not responding is one of the most common problems that most of the users come across. In most cases, a communication problem can be the main reason which creates communication trouble between your PC and printer. For the resolution to such hurdles, you should check all the connection cables and make sure each capable is in the right place. Besides, consider giving a hard reset to your printer can be wise and helps you to fix such problems.

9. How Do I Fix Printer Not Detected?

The main culprit behind the printer not detecting issues is without a doubt the connection hurdles. To get rid of such problems, you should first Power off your device and then power on after a few seconds. Now, check the USB capable and make sure it is stable and working finely. If you find anything wrong, just change the cable. However, you can also opt for the expert’s backing if you are facing the same problems again and again.
